Name: [Assist] Impact Stacker
Desc: Defensive Assist and Assist Follow-Up Daze increases by <color=#2BAD00>100%</color> against normal enemies, <color=#2BAD00>75%</color> against Elite enemies, and <color=#2BAD00>50%</color> against Bosses. (Appears only in Rally Commissions.)
Desc2: An enhancement device that can amplify impact effects for a short time. It's design is said to take inspiration from a woodpecker.
